nodes.text: Jubai Laetlii was a Human male who resided in the Imperial Oasis on Tatooine.
Some time after 0 BBY, Eyan McDermitt sent a spy to repossess a stolen datapad that Jubai had in his possession.

In the game, players could choose to kill Jubai to retrieve the datapad, or steal it from him peacefully. This article assume that Jubai was not killed, as it was the recommended course of action in the game. Star Wars Galaxies was shut down on December 15, 2011.
